title: Asian-Style Eggplant and Green Onion Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 medium eggplants (about 1.5 lbs), cut into 1-inch cubes
6 green onions, cut into 1-inch pieces (whites and greens separated)
instructions: 1. In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, and water to create the sauce. Set aside. 2. Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over medium-high heat. 3. Add eggplant cubes and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until golden brown and tender. Season lightly with salt. 4. Add minced garlic, white parts of green onions, and red pepper flakes (if using). Stir-fry for 1 minute until fragrant. 5. Pour the sauce mixture over the eggplant and toss well. Cook for 2 minutes until sauce thickens and coats the vegetables. 6. Add green parts of green onions and sesame oil. Stir-fry for 30 seconds. 7. Remove from heat and garnish with sesame seeds. 8. Serve immediately over steamed rice or noodles.
description: A savory and tender eggplant dish with aromatic green onions, finished with a glossy garlic-soy glaze. Perfect served over rice or noodles for a satisfying vegetarian lunch.
